document.title: Marketing Municipal Bonds in Tennessee
document.abstract: Many city officials are now confronted for the first time with the task of planning and marketing a bond issue, a technical job and one in which mistakes can be relatively costly. No handbook can substitute for personal investigation of the bond market and consultation with investment houses and specialists. This report is designed to constitute an introduction and a guide for the personal investigation necessary to market a particular bond issue.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Information Report, No. 10.
